General.Name: Allmed Solutions Ltd
General.Description: Allmed Solutions Ltd develops, manufactures, and markets minimally invasive products in various medical disciplines in Israel and internationally. The company offers ureteric, bulbar, triangular and round prostatic, and biliary stents. The company was formerly known as Allium Medical Solutions Ltd. Allmed Solutions Ltd is based in Caesarea, Israel.

1.Name: Mr. Ziv  Kalfon
1.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Elvatix Medical Ltd

2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Alium Ltd
